title: The Fire brigade
creator_credit: Joan Boundy and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: The story of training a young recruit in every aspect of his duty as a fireman attached to a large metropolitan fire brigade. Equipment is demonstrated in detail, including its actual use in a spectacular city fire.
creator_credit_for_label: Joan Boundy and Australian National Film Board
